oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest

Class LocalMVSConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest.MVSConfig
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest.LocalMVSConfig

  • public class LocalMVSConfig
extends MVSConfig
    Holds the configuration values for a Local MVSuggest instance additionally to the general configuration in MVSConfig
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest.MVSConfig

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONF_ENV_IS_REPO_LOC
      Job configuration: boolean value that specifies whether the service location refers to a repository (true) or to a whole MVS directory (false)
      static java.lang.String CONF_ENV_OVERWRITE_PERSIST_SERV_LOC
      Job configuration: boolean value that specifies whether CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC should be overwritten by the content pointed by MVSConfig.CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION (true) or not (false)
      static java.lang.String CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC
      Job configuration: the name of the HDFS path where the MVS directory should be saved.
      static java.lang.String CONF_ENV_REBUILD_INDEX
      Job configuration: boolean value indicating if the MVS directory index should be rebuilt (true) or not (false).

    • Field Detail

      • CONF_ENV_IS_REPO_LOC

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_ENV_IS_REPO_LOC
        Job configuration: boolean value that specifies whether the service location refers to a repository (true) or to a whole MVS directory (false)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_ENV_OVERWRITE_PERSIST_SERV_LOC

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_ENV_OVERWRITE_PERSIST_SERV_LOC
        Job configuration: boolean value that specifies whether CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC should be overwritten by the content pointed by MVSConfig.CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION (true) or not (false)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC
        Job configuration: the name of the HDFS path where the MVS directory should be saved. If the path already exists, it will be used as the service location instead of MVSConfig.CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONF_ENV_REBUILD_INDEX

        public static final java.lang.String CONF_ENV_REBUILD_INDEX
        Job configuration: boolean value indicating if the MVS directory index should be rebuilt (true) or not (false). Default value is false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • getPersistentServiceLocation

        public java.lang.String getPersistentServiceLocation()
        Gets the path where the MVS folder should be saved in HDFS.
        Returns:
        an HDFS path or null if the MVS location is not saved in HDFS.

      • getRepositoryName

        public java.lang.String getRepositoryName()
        Gets the name of the repository folder name in an MVS location
        Returns:
        the repository name

      • isOverwritePersistentServiceLocation

        public boolean isOverwritePersistentServiceLocation()
        Tells whether CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC should be overwritten by MVSConfig.CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION
        Returns:
        true if the persistent location should be overwritten

      • isRebuildIndex

        public boolean isRebuildIndex()
        Tells whether the MVS index should be rebuilt when it does not exist. Default is false.
        Returns:
        true if the index should be rebuilt.

      • isRepositoryLocation

        public boolean isRepositoryLocation()
        Tells whether the current MVS location refers to a repository or not. A repository contains only templates and no MVSuggest configuration file.
        Returns:
        true if the current MVS location is a repository

      • load

        public void load(Configuration conf)
        Description copied from class: MVSConfig
        Loads the MVSuggest configuration from the job configuration
        Overrides:
        load in class MVSConfig
        Parameters:
        conf - a job configuration

      • setOverwritePersistentServiceLocation

        public void setOverwritePersistentServiceLocation(boolean overwritePersistentServiceLocation)
        Sets whether CONF_ENV_PERSIST_SERV_LOC should be overwritten by MVSConfig.CONF_SERVCE_LOCATION
        Parameters:
        overwritePersistentServiceLocation - true if the persistent location should be overwritten

      • setPersistentServiceLocation

        public void setPersistentServiceLocation(java.lang.String persistentServiceLocation)
        Sets the path where the MVS folder should be saved in HDFS.
        Parameters:
        persistentServiceLocation - an HDFS path or null if the MVS location is not saved in HDFS.

      • setRebuildIndex

        public void setRebuildIndex(boolean rebuildIndex)
        Sets whether the MVS index should be rebuilt when it does not exist. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        rebuildIndex - true if the index should be rebuilt

      • setRepositoryLocation

        public void setRepositoryLocation(boolean repositoryLocation)
        Sets whether the current MVS location refers to a repository or not. A repository contains only templates and no MVSuggest configuration file.
        Parameters:
        repositoryLocation - true if the current MVS location is a repository

      • setRepositoryName

        public void setRepositoryName(java.lang.String repositoryName)
        Sets the name of the repository folder name in an MVS location
        Parameters:
        repositoryName - the repository name
